name: Home Bake Croissants
description: The ideal breakfast meal. Croissants can be slit and eaten with wedge of cheese inside it, or wrapped with some bacon or ham. Just toss it in a hot oven for a few minutes and an exotic meal is yours to enjoy.  If you have a sweet tooth, you can also enjoy the croissant with some jam of your choice.*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
